name: Pengu's revenge
description:
A penguin village has been massacred by a rogue demon. Pengu is being offered a new life as a champion of hell to defeat the demon and avenge his friends. 

Controls:

  •  left mouse to move
  •  right mouse to attack, hold for stronger attack
  •  Q to do a roll and a fiery roll once upgraded
  •  W cast fireball once unlocked

Contributors:
